DOC.brief_summary: Subjects participate 12-week church-based intervention five separate component : 1 ) participation weekly group session ; 2 ) daily use Fitbit activity tracker ; 3 ) daily , twice day blood pressure monitoring ; 4 ) daily online food tracking ; 5 ) daily use VR home ( start week 6 ) . Participants also receive phone contact nurse coach ( twice week first 4 week , week remain 8 week ) , answer question provide support .
